full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Information Session Schedule Request for Quotation (RFQ)

```markdown
### St. Stephen 3rd Bridge and Fosterville Ports of Entry (POE)

#### Project Information

* Title: Installation and testing of Cellular Booster Systems
* Solicitation Number: BPM017539
* Date and Time: December 16, 2022, 14:00:00

#### Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide and deliver cellular booster systems that improve existing cellular service signal strength and support consistent & reliable talk, text, and data throughput. Bidders must submit their response through the P2P portal.

**Key Requirements:**

* Install cellular boosters that support up to 8,000 square feet of service.
* The cellular boosters must work with all phones and all carriers, support all 2G, 3G, and 4G services and contain a graphical uplink & downlink power meter.
* Items must be shipping before March 31st, 2023
* Duration of contract: 1 year.

**Additional Requirements:**

* Unscreened Contractor personnel must be escorted by a CBSA employee or a Commissionaire at all times when visiting CBSA facilities.
* Information which is to be used in the development of the contracted product, as reference material or otherwise must be unclassified material and considered to be releasable to the public by CBSA and/or The Government of Canada.

**Contact:**

* Eric Vanasse, Senior Procurement Officer, SSC
* Email: [Eric.Vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Eric.Vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 514 607 8519

#### Documents

Please refer to the RFQ notice for more information on submission guidelines, the list of deliverables, and attachments.

Source: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)
```
